thread.title: Bellator 172 Salaries: Freire ($80K), Kongo ($75K), Koscheck ($75K) Top Payroll
thread.title_full: Bellator 172 Salaries: Freire ($80K), Kongo ($75K), Koscheck ($75K) Top Payroll

author: tcritchfield@sherdog.com (Tristen Critchfield)
title: Bellator 172 Salaries: Freire ($80K), Kongo ($75K), Koscheck ($75K) Top Payroll
text: By Tristen Critchfield Feb 22, 2017 Patricky Freire pocketed an event-high $80,000 for his victory over Josh Thomson in the Bellator 172 headliner this past Saturday. A right uppercut and follow-up hammerfists from “Pitbull” ended Thomson’s night 40 seconds into round two of their lightweight encounter. Thomson earned a disclosed $10,000 in defeat The California State Athletic Commission released salaries from the event to MMAFighting.com on Wednesday. Other top earners for the event included Cheick Kongo , who garnered $75,000 for a lopsided unanimous decision triumph against Oli Thompson in the heavyweight co-main event and Josh Koscheck , who took home $75,000 for his promotional debut, a first-round TKO defeat to Mauricio Alonso ($20,000). Note: The disclosed purses reported by state athletic commissions do not include any performance-based or discretionary bonuses that may be awarded to a fighter by the promotion. Additionally, the reported figures do not reflect any deductions made by the commission for taxes, insurance, etc., and do not include any sponsorship money that a fighter may acquire for their performance.
